                                            <div class="dropdown-menu" aria-labelledby="navbarDropdowndownloads">
                                                <ul class="nav flex-column ul-none">
                                                    <li class="nav-item"><a
                                                            class="nav-link "
                                                            href="https://ipoplatform.com/pdf/SEBI_ICDR_Amendment_Regulations_10_03_2025.pdf"

    /* button to take home page at top */
.okbutton {
    height: 12vw !important;
    width: 12vw !important;
    position: sticky !important;
    top: 91% !important;
    left: 85% !important;
    z-index: 1000;
    background-color: #51bc64;
    border: 2px solid #51bc64;
    border-radius: 50%;
    color: #fff;
    font-size: larger !important;
    padding: 2% !important;
    display: none;
}
</style>


<button id="scrollToTopBtnn" class="d-block d-sm-none okbutton">
    <i class="bi bi-chevron-double-up"></i>
</button>
<script data-cfasync="false" src="/cdn-cgi/scripts/5c5dd728/cloudflare-static/email-decode.min.js"></script><script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
             // sript - button to take page to top
        window.onscroll = function() {
            const btn = document.getElementById("scrollToTopBtnn");
            if (document.body.scrollTop > 100 || document.documentElement.scrollTop > 100) {
                btn.style.display = "block";
            } else {
                btn.style.display = "none";
            }
        };

// Scroll to top smoothly
document.getElementById("scrollToTopBtnn").onclick = function() {
  window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' });
};
    </script>
<a href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/by-year/2025">
    <section class="metrics-section HomePageTopMargin">
        <div class="metrics-section-scroll-bar">
            <div class="each-entity">
                <div class="metrics-section-delimiter"></div>
                <div class="each-entity-metric">
                    <div class="total-count-metric">
                        <p>
                            <span class="total-count-metric-value ng-binding">227</span>
                            &nbsp;Total SME IPOs listed in 2025
                        </p>
                    </div>

<script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
        const navbarCollapse = document.getElementById('navbarNav');
        const navbarToggler = document.querySelector('.navbar-toggler');
        navbarToggler.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            e.stopPropagation();
            navbarCollapse.classList.toggle('show');
        });
        document.body.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            if (!navbarCollapse.contains(e.target) && !navbarToggler.contains(e.target)) {
                navbarCollapse.classList.remove('show');
            }
        });
        document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown-toggle').forEach((dropdown) => {
            dropdown.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
                e.preventDefault(); // Prevent default link behavior
                e.stopPropagation();
                const parentDropdown = dropdown.closest('.dropdown');
                const dropdownMenu = parentDropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-menu');
                parentDropdown.classList.toggle('show');
                dropdownMenu.classList.toggle('show');

                document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach((otherDropdown) => {
                    if (otherDropdown !== parentDropdown) {
                        otherDropdown.classList.remove('show');
                        otherDropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-menu').classList.remove(
                            'show');
                    }
                });
            });
        });
        document.body.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
            document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach((dropdown) => {
                if (!dropdown.contains(e.target)) {
                    dropdown.classList.remove('show');
                    dropdown.querySelector('.dropdown-menu').classList.remove('show');
                }
            });
        });
    });
</script>
<script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
        const dropdownMappings = [
            'navbarDropdownResources',
            'navbarDropdownKYS',
            'navbarDropdownKYSS',
            'navbarDropdownCalc'
        ];

        const dropdownMenus = [];

        dropdownMappings.forEach(id => {
            const menu = document.querySelector(`[aria-labelledby="${id}"]`);
            const link = menu?.previousElementSibling;

            if (link && menu) {
                dropdownMenus.push(menu);

                link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                    e.preventDefault();
                    e.stopPropagation();

                    // Hide all other menus first
                    dropdownMenus.forEach(m => {
                        if (m !== menu) m.classList.remove('show');
                    });

                    // Toggle this one
                    menu.classList.toggle('show');
                });
            }
        });

        // Close all dropdowns on outside click
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!e.target.closest('.dropdown')) {
                dropdownMenus.forEach(menu => menu.classList.remove('show'));
            }
        });
    });
</script>

<!-- Popup Modal -->
<div id="MBbyid">
    <div id="imageModal" class="modal">
        <div class="modal-content" style="height: 1200px;">
            <span class="close" onclick="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; closeModal()" data-cf-modified-1df338fd90c26394a301633e-="">&times;</span>
            <h3 class="text-center" id="popupTitle"></h3>
            <div class="popupbutton text-center">
                <a id="downloadBtn" class="download btn btn-primary" href="#" download>
                    Download
                </a>

                <button onclick="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; shareImage()" class="btn btn-info" data-cf-modified-1df338fd90c26394a301633e-="">
                    Share
                </button>
                <button onclick="if (!window.__cfRLUnblockHandlers) return false; closeModal()" class="btn btn-danger" data-cf-modified-1df338fd90c26394a301633e-="">
                    Close
                </button>
            </div>

            <img id="popupImage" src="https://www.ipoplatform.com/loader.gif" alt="Image" class="popupimage">



        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
    function openImagePopup(title, fileUrl) {
        document.getElementById('popupTitle').innerText = title;
        document.getElementById('popupImage').src = fileUrl;
        document.getElementById('downloadBtn').href = fileUrl;
        document.getElementById('downloadBtn').setAttribute("download", title);
        document.getElementById('imageModal').style.display = "flex";

        // Store file URL for sharing
        window.currentFileUrl = fileUrl;
        window.currentFileTitle = title;
    }

    function closeModal() {
        document.getElementById('imageModal').style.display = "none";
    }

    function closeModaloot() {
        document.getElementById('myModal').style.display = "none";
    }

    function shareImage() {
        if (navigator.share) {
            navigator.share({
                title: window.currentFileTitle,
                text: 'Check out this image',
                url: window.currentFileUrl
            });
        } else {
            alert("Sharing not supported. Copy this link: " + window.currentFileUrl);
        }
    }
</script>

                                    <div class="gap-4"></div>
                                    <h1 class="fs32">Milestone Gears Limited IPO Analysis

                                    </h1>

                                    <div class="gap2"></div>

                                    <div>

                                    <div class="gap-2"></div>

                                    <div class="col-md-8 col-sm-12">
                                        <div class="gap-4"></div>
                                        <p>
                                            <b>
                                                Milestone Gears </b>
                                            IPO is a
                                            Book Building
                                            listing on <b> BSE,NSE</b>
                                            exchange, with an ipo size of ₹
                                            [●] Cr.
                                            The company is based in <a
                                                href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/geography-wise-ipos/solan"><b>Solan</b></a>
                                            and caters to <a
                                                href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/know-your-sector/electric-equipments"><b>Electric Equipments</b></a>
                                            sector.
                                                                                                                                                <a
                                                        href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/merchant-banker-mainboard/axis-capital-limited/116">
                                                        <b>Axis Capital </b>
                                                    </a>
                                                                                                            ,
                                                                                                                                                        <a
                                                        href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/merchant-banker-mainboard/jm-financial-limited/168">
                                                        <b>Jm Financial </b>
                                                    </a>
                                                                                                            ,
                                                                                                                                                        <a
                                                        href="https://www.ipoplatform.com/merchant-banker-mainboard/motilal-oswal-investment-advisors-limited/179">
                                                        <b>Motilal Oswal Investment Advisors </b>
                                                    </a>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            are the merchant bankers
                                             of
                                            <b>Milestone Gears </b>
                                            IPO. It is a
                                            
                                            <b>MainBoard Upcoming</b>
                                            IPO which filed its Draft Red Herring
                                            Prospectus (DRHP) on
                                            <b>18th November 2025</b>.
                                        <div class="gap-3"></div>
                                        <b>
                                            Milestone Gears </b>
                                        IPO posted revenues of
                                        <b> ₹ 672.12 Cr.</b>
                                        and PAT
                                        of
                                        <b> ₹ 37.44 Cr.</b>
                                        in
                                                                                FY26
                                        on
                                        annualised basis.
                                        </p>

                                        <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                        <!-- Key-Highlight for Mobile -->
                                        <div class="key-highlights mobile-visible">

                                                <small class="font_size_10px">*At the time of IPO, on Annualised
                                                    Basis</small>

                                                        &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; EBITDA: <b class="brand-primary">

                                                <h4>What are the key financial metrics in
                                                    Milestone Gears
                                                    prospectus?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>

                                                    The
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO prospectus highlights an Return on Equity
                                                    (ROE) of
                                                                                                                                                                <b> 6.90
                                                        </b>
                                                                                                        % , Return on Assets (ROA) of

                                                                                                                                                                <b> 1.44
                                                        </b>
                                                                                                        %, and an EBITDA Margin of

                                                                                                                                                                <b> 18.91
                                                        </b>
                                                                                                        %, showcasing financial performance.

                                                </p>
                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4> How do profitability ratios impact the evaluation of
                                                    Milestone Gears
                                                    IPO?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>Profitability ratios like Return on Equity (ROE), Return on Assets (ROA),
                                                    and
                                                    Net Profit
                                                    Margin shows
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO financial report.
                                                    Analysing these metrics can provide insights into the company’s
                                                    efficiency,
                                                    profitability,
                                                    and long-term growth potential.

                                                </p>

                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4>What is the market capitalisation for
                                                    Milestone Gears
                                                    IPO ?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>


                                                    The post-IPO market capitalisation of
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO is
                                                    ₹ [●] Cr., based on the
                                                    issue price and
                                                    share structure. It helps investors
                                                    gauge the
                                                    company’s valuation and compare it with industry peers before investing.

                                                </p>

                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4>What is the PE Multiple of
                                                    Milestone Gears
                                                    IPO?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>
                                                    The
                                                    Milestone Gears IPO
                                                    has a Price-to-Earnings (PE) ratio
                                                    of
                                                    [●],
                                                    indicating valuation compared to industry peers. It helps investors
                                                    determine if the stock is
                                                    overvalued or undervalued compared to its earnings and industry peers.
                                                </p>

                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4>What is the Revenue of
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO reported revenue of ₹ 672.12
                                                    Cr.
                                                    in
                                                    the latest fiscal
                                                    year, showing business performance, on annualised basis. Revenue figures
                                                    from
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO provide insights into sales growth, market demand, and business
                                                    scalability.
                                                </p>

                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4>What is the EBITDA of
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>

                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    recorded an EBITDA of
                                                     ₹ 127.08 Cr.,
                                                    reflecting
                                                    operational efficiency. EBITDA (Earnings Before Interest, Taxes,
                                                    Depreciation, and
                                                    Amortisation) measures operational profitability.
                                                </p>

                                                <div class="gap-2"></div>
                                                <h4> What is the PAT of
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    IPO?
                                                </h4>
                                                <p>
                                                    Milestone Gears 
                                                    Profit After Tax (PAT) is ₹ 37.44 Cr., reflecting
                                                    earnings growth. Profit After Tax (PAT) reflects the company’s actual
                                                    earnings after all
                                                    expenses, taxes, and deductions
                                                </p>


                                            </div>
                                                                            </div>


                                    <div class="col-md-4 col-sm-12">

                        through its subsidiary <strong>IntelliFin Private Limited</strong>. Committed to providing
                        reliable information and valuable resources, we specialize in helping the Promoters in their
                        Fundraise and IPO Journey in the most transparent manner.</p>
            <hr/>

<script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
    $(function() {
        $(".pop").click(function() {

            $(".modal .modal-content").html
            var pageTitle = $(this).attr('data-pageTitle');
            var pageName = $(this).attr('data-pageName');
            //alert(data-pageName);
            $(".modal .modal-title").hide()
            $(".modal .btn-default").hide()
            $(".modal .btn-primary").hide()
            $(".modal .modal-title").html(pageTitle);
            $(".modal .modal-body").html("Content loading please wait...");
            $(".modal").modal({
                show: true
            });
            $(".modal .modal-content").load(pageName);
        });
    });



    function popup_win(url) {
        NewWin = window.open(url, "popup_win",
            "toolbar=no,menubar=no,left=0,top=0,scrollbars=yes,width=650,height=450,resizable=1")
        NewWin.focus()
        return (false)
    }

    function openpopup(slug, cat_id, topic1, topic2, topic3, name) {
        window.open("https://www.ipoplatform.com/comment/" + slug + "/" + cat_id + "/" + topic1 + "/" + topic2 + "/" + topic3 +
            "/" + name + "?call=" + Math.floor((Math.random() * 100000000) + 1) + "", "_blank",
            "toolbar=yes, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, top=100,left=1000,width=700, height=780");
    }
    var spinner = $('#loader');

    // Custom dropdown behavior for mobile nested menus
    $(document).ready(function() {
        $('.dropdown-submenu a.dropdown-toggle').on("click", function(e) {
            var $el = $(this).next('.dropdown-menu');
            $el.toggleClass('show');
            e.stopPropagation();
        });

        // Hide dropdowns when clicking outside
        $('.dropdown').on("hidden.bs.dropdown", function() {
            $('.dropdown-menu.show').removeClass('show');
        });
    });


    $(document).ready(function() {

        if ($('#search_cat_page').length && $('#search_val_page').length) {

            $("#search_cat_page").change(function() {
                var search_by = $(this).val();
                var dataString = 'search_by=' + search_by;

                $.ajax({
                    type: "GET",
                    url: "https://www.ipoplatform.com/get-search-values",
                    data: dataString,
                    cache: false,
                    success: function(data) {
                        var search_vals = data.search_vals;
                        var search_by_label = "Select"; // Default label
                        console.log(search_by_label);

                        // Dynamically setting the label based on the selected category
                        if (search_by == "city") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Mumbai";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "sector") {
                            search_by_label = "For example: Advertising and Media";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "ipo-size") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Very Small";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "pe-ratio") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Low";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "exchange") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: BSE or NSE";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "merchant-banker") {
                            search_by_label =
                                "Search for example: Affinity Global Capital Market Private Limited";
                        }

                        // Clear existing options and add new ones
                        $('#search_val_page').empty(); // Remove all options
                        $('#search_val_page').append('<option value="" selected>' +
                            search_by_label + '</option>'); // Add placeholder
                        $('#search_val_page').append(
                            '<option value="all">All</option>'); // Add "All" option

                        // Loop through search values and append as options
                        Object.keys(search_vals).forEach(key => {
                            $('#search_val_page').append('<option value="' + key +
                                '">' + search_vals[key] + '</option>');
                        });

                        // Refresh the selectpicker and update the title for the placeholder

                        $('#search_val_page').select2({
                            placeholder: search_by_label,
                            allowClear: false
                        });;
                    }
                });
            });

            $("#search_val_page").change(function() {
                var search_by = $("#search_cat_page").val();
                var search_value = $(this).val();
                if ($(this).val()) {
                    if (search_by == "sector") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/know-your-sector/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "city") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/geography-wise-ipos/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "ipo-size") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/ipos-based-on-size/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "pe-ratio") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/pe-valuation/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "exchange") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo-insights/exchange-wise-ipos/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "merchant-banker") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/merchant-banker/" +
                            search_value;
                    }
                }
            });

            $("#search_cat_page").change();
        } else {
            console.warn("Required elements #search_cat_page or #search_val_page are missing.");
        }


        if ($('#search_cat_page_mb').length && $('#search_val_page_mb').length) {

            $("#search_cat_page_mb").change(function() {
                var search_by = $(this).val();
                var dataString = 'search_by=' + search_by + '&mainbaord=1';

                $.ajax({
                    type: "GET",
                    url: "https://www.ipoplatform.com/get-search-values",
                    data: dataString,
                    cache: false,
                    success: function(data) {
                        var search_vals = data.search_vals;
                        var search_by_label = "Select"; // Default label
                        console.log(search_by_label);

                        // Dynamically setting the label based on the selected category
                        if (search_by == "city") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Mumbai";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "sector") {
                            search_by_label = "For example: Advertising and Media";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "ipo-size") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Very Small";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "pe-ratio") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: Low";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "exchange") {
                            search_by_label = "Search for example: BSE or NSE";
                        }
                        if (search_by == "merchant-banker") {
                            search_by_label =
                                "Search for example: Affinity Global Capital Market Private Limited";
                        }

                        // Clear existing options and add new ones
                        $('#search_val_page_mb').empty(); // Remove all options
                        $('#search_val_page_mb').append('<option value="" selected>' +
                            search_by_label + '</option>'); // Add placeholder
                        $('#search_val_page_mb').append(
                            '<option value="all">All</option>'); // Add "All" option

                        // Loop through search values and append as options
                        Object.keys(search_vals).forEach(key => {
                            $('#search_val_page_mb').append('<option value="' +
                                key + '">' + search_vals[key] + '</option>');
                        });

                        // Refresh the selectpicker and update the title for the placeholder
                        $('#search_val_page_mb').select2({
                            placeholder: search_by_label,
                            allowClear: false
                        });
                    }
                });
            });

            $("#search_val_page_mb").change(function() {
                var search_by = $("#search_cat_page_mb").val();
                var search_value = $(this).val();
                if ($(this).val()) {
                    if (search_by == "sector") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/know-your-sector/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "city") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/geography-wise-ipos/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "ipo-size") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/ipos-based-on-size/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "pe-ratio") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/pe-valuation/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "exchange") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/main-board/exchange-wise-ipos/" +
                            search_value;
                    }

                    if (search_by == "merchant-banker") {
                        window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/merchant-banker-mainboard/" +
                            search_value;
                    }
                }
            });
            $("#search_cat_page_mb").change();
        } else {
            console.warn("Required elements #search_cat_page_mb or #search_val_page_mb are missing.");
        }

    });


    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        // Select all images
        const images = document.querySelectorAll("img");

        // Loop through images and add an error event listener
        images.forEach(img => {
            img.addEventListener("error", function() {
                // Replace with default image if the current one fails to load
                this.src = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/no_image.png";
            });
        });
    });

    $(document).ready(function() {
        $('select').each(function() {
            $(this).select2({
                placeholder: $(this).find('option[value=""]')
                    .text(), // Use the blank option as the placeholder
                allowClear: false // Enable clear button if desired
            });
        });
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.dropdown').forEach(function(dropdown) {
        dropdown.addEventListener('mouseover', function(e) {
            e.stopPropagation(); // Prevent hover from triggering the menu
        });
    });
</script>

<!-- script to see the less paragraph in mobile with see more/less button  -->
<script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        setTimeout(function() {
            if (window.innerWidth <= 768) {
                const p = document.getElementById("truncate-target");
                if (p) {
                    const fullText = p.textContent.trim();
                    if (fullText.length > 200) {
                        const shortText = fullText.slice(0, 190);
                        p.innerHTML = `
                        <span class="short-text">${shortText}...</span>
                        <span class="full-text">${fullText}</span>
                        <span class="see-more-btn">See more</span>
                        `;
                        p.classList.add("truncated-text");

                        const seeMoreBtn = p.querySelector(".see-more-btn");
                        seeMoreBtn.addEventListener("click", function() {
                            p.classList.toggle("expanded");
                            this.textContent = p.classList.contains("expanded") ? "See less" :
                                "See more";
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        }, 100);
    });

    document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
        const formatter = new Intl.NumberFormat('en-IN', {
            minimumFractionDigits: 2,
            maximumFractionDigits: 2
        });

        // List of table IDs to apply formatting
        const tableIds = ["pe-summary", "ipo-size-summary"];

        tableIds.forEach(tableId => {
            const table = document.getElementById(tableId);
            if (!table) return;

            const rows = table.querySelectorAll("tbody tr");

            rows.forEach(row => {
                const cell = row.cells[1]; // 2nd <td>
                if (cell) {
                    let raw = cell.textContent.trim().replace(/,/g, '');

                    // Handle cases where there are extra characters (e.g., %)
                    const num = parseFloat(raw);
                    if (!isNaN(num)) {
                        cell.textContent = formatter.format(num);
                    }
                }
            });
        });
    });

    $(document).ready(function() {
        if ($('#search_ipos2').length != 0) {
            let $select2 = $('#search_ipos2');
            // Fetch IPOs via AJAX
            $.ajax({
                url: '/api/get-all-ipos',
                type: 'GET',
                dataType: 'json',
                success: function(response) {
                    $select2.empty(); // Clear old options
                    $select2.append('<option value="">Search IPO</option>');

                    $.each(response, function(index, option) {
                        let label;

                        switch (option.ipo_type) {
                            case 'SME':
                                label = `${option.company_name} (SME)`;
                                break;
                            case 'MAINBOARD':
                                label = `${option.company_name} (Mainboard)`;
                                break;
                            case 'SMEUPCOMING':
                                label = `${option.company_name} (SME Upcoming)`;
                                break;
                            case 'MAINBOARDUPCOMING':
                                label = `${option.company_name} (Mainboard Upcoming)`;
                                break;
                            default:
                                label = `${option.company_name} (${option.ipo_type})`;
                        }

                        $select2.append(
                            `<option value="${option.id}" data-id="${option.chittorgarh_slug}">${label}</option>`
                        );
                    });

                    // Refresh the selectpicker after adding options
                    //$select2.selectpicker('refresh');
                },
                error: function() {
                    console.error('Failed to fetch IPO options');
                }
            });

            // Handle search dropdown change
            $select2.on('change', function() {
                let selectedOption = $(this).find("option:selected");
                let search_value_ipo = $(this).val();
                let slug_ipo = selectedOption.data("id");

                // Ignore if default option selected
                if (search_value_ipo && slug_ipo) {
                    window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo/" + slug_ipo + '/' + search_value_ipo;
                }
            });
        }
    });
</script>
        <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/OwlCarousel2/2.3.4/owl.carousel.min.js" type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript"></script>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $("#search").change(function() {
                // Get the selected option
                var selectedOption = $(this).find("option:selected");

                // Get the data-id and value from the selected option
                var search_value = $(this).val();
                var slug = selectedOption.data("id"); // Get data-id from the selected option
                var id = selectedOption.attr("data-id"); // Alternatively, using attr

                console.log(id);
                console.log(slug);

                // Redirect to the new URL
                window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo/" + slug + '/' + search_value;
            });

            $("#search2").change(function() {
                // Get the selected option
                var selectedOption = $(this).find("option:selected");

                // Get the data-id and value from the selected option
                var search_value = $(this).val();
                var slug = selectedOption.data("id"); // Get data-id from the selected option
                var id = selectedOption.attr("data-id"); // Alternatively, using attr

                console.log(id);
                console.log(slug);

                // Redirect to the new URL
                window.location.href = "https://www.ipoplatform.com/ipo/" + slug + '/' + search_value;
            });

        });

        function showOtherBankers() {
            // Show the hidden bankers and hide the "Show More" link
            document.getElementById('other-bankers').style.display = 'block';
            document.querySelector('.show-more').style.display = 'none';
        }

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.owl-carousel').owlCarousel({
                loop: true,
                margin: 10,
                nav: false,
                dots: true,
                navText: ["<i class='fas fa-chevron-left'></i>", "<i class='fas fa-chevron-right'></i>"],
                responsive: {
                    0: {
                        items: 1
                    },
                    600: {
                        items: 2
                    },
                    1000: {
                        items: 4
                    }
                },
                onInitialized: limitDots,
                onTranslated: limitDots,
            });

            function limitDots() {
                let $dots = $('.owl-dots .owl-dot');
                $dots.each(function(index) {
                    $(this).css('display', index < 7 ? 'inline-block' : 'none');
                });
            }
        });

        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
            const toggleButton = document.getElementById('toggle-anchor-investors');
            const items = document.querySelectorAll('.anchor-investor-item');

            toggleButton.addEventListener('click', function() {
                const isExpanded = toggleButton.textContent.trim() === 'Show Less';
                items.forEach((item, index) => {
                    if (index > 0) {
                        item.classList.toggle('hidden_anchor', isExpanded);
                        item.classList.toggle('d-none', isExpanded);
                    }
                });
                toggleButton.textContent = isExpanded ? 'Show More' : 'Show Less';
            });
        });

        function toggleInfo() {
            const preview = document.getElementById('company-info-preview');
            const full = document.getElementById('company-info-full');
            const button = document.getElementById('toggle-info');

            if (full.style.display === 'none') {
                // Show full content
                full.style.display = 'block';
                preview.style.display = 'none';
                button.textContent = 'Show Less';
            } else {
                // Show preview content
                full.style.display = 'none';
                preview.style.display = 'block';
                button.textContent = 'Show More';
            }
        }
        $label_chart = [];
        var fontSize = 10; // Default font size
        if (window.innerWidth <= 768) { // Check if the screen width is less than or equal to 768px (mobile view)
            fontSize = 8; // Smaller font size for mobile
        } else {
            fontSize = 10; // Default font size for larger screens
        }
        var ctx1 = document.getElementById('revenueChart').getContext('2d');
        Chart.register(ChartDataLabels);
        var revenueChart = new Chart(ctx1, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: ['FY23','FY24','FY25','Jun-25'],
                datasets: [{
                    label: 'Revenue',
                    data: [612.94,533.32,530.17,672.12],
                    backgroundColor: '#CDEDCB',
                    borderColor: 'rgb(152, 219, 168)',
                    borderWidth: 1,
                    maxBarThickness: 25,

                }]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                scales: {
                    x: {
                        grid: {
                            drawOnChartArea: false
                        }
                    },
                    y: {
                        grid: {
                            drawOnChartArea: false
                        },

                        ticks: {
                            padding: 20 // Ensure there is padding at the bottom of the chart
                        }
                    }
                },
                plugins: {
                    legend: {
                        display: false // This will hide the dataset label in the legend
                    },
                    datalabels: {
                        // Position the label above the bar
                        anchor: 'end',
                        align: 'top',
                        font: {
                            weight: 'bold',
                            size: fontSize
                        },
                        color: '#32CD32', // Light green text color
                        padding: 5, // Space around the text
                        backgroundColor: '#fff', // White background bubble
                        borderRadius: 10, // Rounded corners for the bubble
                        borderColor: '#32CD32', // Green border around the bubble
                        borderWidth: 1, // Width of the border
                        formatter: function(value, context) {
                            return value; // Custom format for the label
                        },
                        // Shadow effect for the label (for glow)
                        shadowBlur: 10,
                        shadowColor: 'rgba(0, 255, 0, 0.5)', // Green shadow effect
                        shadowOffsetX: 0,
                        shadowOffsetY: 0,
                        z: 10,
                    }
                }
            }
        });

        // Dropdown toggle
        const dropdown = document.getElementById('documents');
        dropdown.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (e.target !== dropdown) {

            } else {
                this.classList.toggle('show-dropdown');
            }
        });
        // Close the dropdown when clicking outside of it
        document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            if (!dropdown.contains(e.target)) { // If the click is outside the dropdown
                dropdown.classList.remove('show-dropdown'); // Close the dropdown
            }
        });
    </script>
    <script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
        document.getElementById('sharePage2').addEventListener('click', async () => {
            if (navigator.share) {
                try {
                    await navigator.share({
                        title: document.title,
                        url: window.location.href
                    });
                } catch (err) {
                    console.error('Error sharing:', err);
                }
            } else {
                alert('Sharing is not supported in this browser.');
            }
        });

        // Optional: Fallback download if share fails or not supported
        function fallbackDownload(imageUrl) {
            const link = document.createElement('a');
            link.href = imageUrl;
            link.download = 'Milestone-Gears-IPO.jpg';
            link.click();
        }
    </script>
    <script type="1df338fd90c26394a301633e-text/javascript">
        document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
            const tab = document.querySelector(".tabdocument");
            const dropdown = tab.querySelector(".dropdown-contentt");
            tab.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.stopPropagation();
                tab.classList.toggle("active");
            });
            dropdown.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
                e.stopPropagation(); // prevents bubbling up to document
            });
            document.addEventListener("click", function() {
                tab.classList.remove("active");
            });
        });
    </script>
